channel.title: Comments on: State of the Game
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description:
:)
I can't wait! And I am happy that there is some sort of solution for the card holdup.
Kudos, as usual!
item.content:encoded:
ðŸ™‚

I can’t wait! And I am happy that there is some sort of solution for the card holdup.

Kudos, as usual!

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description:
I just need to get proofs on the new Guest cards, approve the proofs and then see final versions of the cards. I already have the final version of the other cards, box, etc.
They still haven't given me a time estimate, no matter how many times I ask. They originally told me 2 months from when I signed off. So I'm guessing it will ship in November.
item.content:encoded:
I just need to get proofs on the new Guest cards, approve the proofs and then see final versions of the cards. I already have the final version of the other cards, box, etc.

They still haven’t given me a time estimate, no matter how many times I ask. They originally told me 2 months from when I signed off. So I’m guessing it will ship in November.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: This is still the galley copy stage? Any chance it'll be back from the printer before the holiday shopping season? :)
item.content:encoded: This is still the galley copy stage? Any chance it’ll be back from the printer before the holiday shopping season? ðŸ™‚
